title: Rich and strange = East of Shanghai
creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock and British International Pictures
brief_description: After coming into a small inheritance, a suburban couple, bored with life’s routine, seek a taste of the high life and excitement by going on a world cruise. One of Hitchcock’s personal favourites, the film is a sad/comic reflection upon marriage and the lives of ordinary people thrown into chaos. Stars Henry kendal and Joan Barry.
